#include <bits/stdc++.h>

using namespace std;

int main(){
	int t;
	cin>>t;
	while(t--){
		int n;
		cin>>n;
		int a[n];
		for(int i=0;i<n;i++){
			cin>>a[i];
		}
		int lmin = 1;
		int lmax = a[0]-1;
		int ans = n;
		for(int i=1;i<n;i++){
			if(lmin>a[i]-1){
				ans++;
				lmin = max(1,a[i]-lmax+1);
				lmax = a[i]-1;
			}
			else{
				int temp = lmin;
				lmin = max(1,a[i]-lmax);
				lmax = a[i]-temp;
			}
		}
		cout<<ans<<endl;
	}
	return 0;
}
